nodes.documentation:
@title Taxable token
 * @dev Manages dynamic taxes
nodes.name: Taxable

nodes.documentation: @dev Event that is emited when the owner changes the tax of the token.
nodes.name: TaxChange

nodes.documentation: Returns the tax recipient account
nodes.name: taxRecipientAddr

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the current tax amount.
nodes.name: currentTaxAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the current tax shift.
nodes.name: currentTaxShift

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You can't set a tax greater than 3%"

arguments.value: You can't set a tax greater than 3%

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "You can't set a tax greater than 3%"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Change the dynamic tax.
     * Just the contract admin can change the taxes.
The possible tax range is 0% ~ 3% and cannot exceed it.
     * Reference table:
3, 0 (3 / 100)   = 3%
3, 1 (3 / 1000)  = 0.3%
3, 2 (3 / 10000) = 0.03%
     * @param amount The new tax amount chosen
nodes.name: changeTax

nodes.documentation:
Used to check the tax value that will be applied to a
given amount.
     * @param value the amount that will transferred.
nodes.name: simulateTaxValue

nodes.documentation:
Used to check the total amount that will discounted
from sender after applying the tax.
     * @param value the amount that will transferred.
nodes.name: simulateTransferValue

nodes.documentation:
Considering a tax that will be applied over a value, what is
the value to request as trasnfer amount and make the sender balance
to be zero as resultant.
     * @param value the amount that will transferred.
nodes.name: amountToCleanBalance

nodes.documentation:
@dev Apply the tax based on the dynamic tax container
     * @param value The value of transaction
nodes.name: _applyTax

changeTax(uint256,uint256).details: Change the dynamic tax.     * Just the contract admin can change the taxes. The possible tax range is 0% ~ 3% and cannot exceed it.     * Reference table: 3, 0 (3 / 100)   = 3% 3, 1 (3 / 1000)  = 0.3% 3, 2 (3 / 10000) = 0.03%

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

amountToCleanBalance(uint256).notice: Considering a tax that will be applied over a value, what is the value to request as trasnfer amount and make the sender balance to be zero as resultant.

simulateTaxValue(uint256).notice: Used to check the tax value that will be applied to a given amount.

simulateTransferValue(uint256).notice: Used to check the total amount that will discounted from sender after applying the tax.
